name: find_and_replace_object_names

arguments.name: orig_string
arguments.display_name: Type the text you want search for in object names

arguments.name: new_string
arguments.display_name: Type the text you want to add in place of the found text

name_xml: Find and Replace Object Names in the Model
modeler_description_xml: Loop through objects. If the object has a name then search for string, and replace if found.
description_xml: This measure will find and replace the string you search for in names of all objects in the model.
